A list of code projects/snippets that I want to show the world:

  • Jan 28 2011: JavaScript Game of Life
    Conway's Game of Life Cellular Automaton, created using JavaScript
  • Dec 24 2010: Scala Patience Diff
    An implementation of the patience diff algorithm, as found in several modern VCS programs
  • Dec 22 2010: C# Pushdown Automaton
    A C# implementation of a pushdown automaton
  • Nov 29 2010: C#/LINQ to find Thompson/Speedtouch router's default SSID/Access keys
    A C#/LINQ implementation of the Thompson/Speedtouch default SSID/password generator.
  • Nov 29 2010: Scala implementation of Patience sort
    A simple Scala implementation of the patience sort algorithm
  • Oct 19 2010: Haskell "Weasel Program" Genetic Algorithm
    A Haskell implementation of the "Weasel Program" genetic algorithm.
  • Oct 01 2010: Of0ck the language
    A modification of the BF programming language, which is even worse to look at!
  • Oct 01 2010: Linux Kernel Greynet implementation
    A dynamic greynet implementation for the Linux kernel 2.6.31, mentioned in RFC6018
  • Oct 21 2009: AES using ECB Demo using Python
    A comparison between ECB and CBC in the AES algorithm using Python

A list of OSS contributions I've made; some are small, but it's nice to be able to remember them:

  • I was a core member of the Darcs VCS team, contributing many patches
  • I added support for IPv6 extension headers to the dpkt Python library, in the google code issue
  • I improved certain error messages of the Haskell packaging tool cabal, the merged pull request is on github
  • Boolean algebras are closed under pairing; I added an instance to a Haskell Boolean algebra library cond to recognise this on github
Owen Stephens 2015
